00040 #ifndef _timermanager_h
00041 #define _timermanager_h
00042 
00043 #include "managerbase.h"
00044 #include "datatypes.h"
00045 #include "timer.h"
00046 
00047 namespace Ogre
00048 {
00049     class Timer;
00050 }
00051 
00052 namespace phys
00053 {
00054     class ExtendedTimer;
00055     class SimpleTimer;
00056     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00057     /// @class TimerManager
00058     /// @headerfile timermanager.h
00059     /// @brief A manager responsible for the updating of all timers in use by this engine.
00060     /// @details
00061     ///////////////////////////////////////
00062     class TimerManager : public ManagerBase
00063     {
00064         protected:
00065             std::vector<Timer*> Timers;
00066             Ogre::Timer* MasterTimer;
00067         public:
00068             /// @brief Standard Constructor.
00069             TimerManager();
00070             /// @brief Class Destructor.
00071             virtual ~TimerManager();
00072             /// @brief Creates a simple timer within this manager.
00073             /// @return Returns a pointer to the created timer.
00074             /// @param Style The style of timer you wish to create.
00075             virtual SimpleTimer* CreateSimpleTimer(const Timer::TimerStyle Style);
00076             /// @brief Creates an extended timer within this manager.
00077             /// @return Returns a pointer to the created timer.
00078             /// @param Style The style of timer you wish to create.
00079             virtual ExtendedTimer* CreateExtendedTimer(const Timer::TimerStyle Style);
00080             /// @brief Gets a Timer by index.
00081             /// @return Returns a pointer to the Timer at the specified index.
00082             virtual Timer* GetTimer(const Whole Index);
00083             /// @brief Gets the number of Timers created and stored in this manager.
00084             /// @return Returns the number of Timers this manager is storing.
00085             virtual Whole GetNumTimers();
00086             /// @brief Destroys a timer within this manager.
00087             /// @param ToBeDestroyed A pointer to the timer class to be destroyed.
00088             virtual void DestroyTimer(Timer* ToBeDestroyed);
00089 
00090             //Inherited From ManagerBase
00091             /// @brief Empty Initializor.
00092             /// @details This specific initializor is unneeded, but we implement it for compatibility. It also exists
00093             /// in case a derived class wants to override it for some reason.
00094             virtual void Initialize();
00095 
00096             /// @brief Items to be done during the mainloop.
00097             /// @details Updates all the timers.
00098             virtual void DoMainLoopItems();
00099 
00100             /// @brief This returns the type of this manager.
00101             /// @return This returns ManagerTypeName::TimerManager.
00102             virtual ManagerTypeName GetType() const;
00103     };
00104 }
00105 
00106 #endif
